metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000469 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cobbler version up to 2.8.2 is vulnerable to a command injection vulnerability in the "add repo" component resulting in arbitrary code execution as root user.

notes.Note: msalvatore> A comment on issue #1856 indicates that the commit may not resolve the issue.

criterions.comment: cobbler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
